topic.title: Compulsory Vaccination is a Jewish Weapon against Gentiles
topic.body:
More and more countries have introduced compulsory vaccination for children.
Only Jews may opt out because vaccines are not kosher.
They say vaccination is for the population health. In reality the Jews are prepared for a grand scale sterilization of Gentile. Mainly white Gentiles. A limited number of obedient black africans will be left to serve the Jews.
Watch by every compulsory mass vaccination of children if Jewish children opt out.
If Jews make use of their opt out right you know what it is.

This is not a conspiracy theory.
In Africa it was tested in secret on grand scale and 5-6 million nigger girls have been sterilized with thetanus vaccines.
http://africanagenda.net/sterility-by-vaccination/
